name: Treadstone Enterprises
overview:
Treadstone works with Australian clients seeking funding for early stage or development work. Our expertise is in winning government grants. We also provide consulting services to ensure that your market entry strategy is successful.

  1. Winning Government Grants Some of our work has included the following grants: -EMDG (export market development grant) -Commercial Ready Grant (closed) -Climate Ready Grant -Biofuels Grant -Collaborative Internet Innovation Fund (CIIF)

  2. Additional Funding Integral to government grant success is the ability to have matching funding. We have strong networks and contacts across a range of industries that we call on as investors if needed.

  3. Market Entry Strategy We identify market segments, channel partners and assit you in getting to your customers. We focus on delivering innnovation and technology to new markets in Australia and for export. We work with you to make sure that your marketing is 100% driven to provide cashflow back into your business. We provide: -Strategic Plans: we review and fine tune your strategic plan -Commercial delivery: we work for you to build your business -Ongoing partnership: we provide stategic advice on a long term basis
